author: Alex Sherman
title: SoftBank strategy shifts from long-term domination to short-term survival as Vision Fund prepares for global downturn
description: Extended coronavirus vaccines could hit many of the Vision Fund's largest investments, including Uber, Didi, Grab and WeWork, particularly hard as consumers stay home.
content:
SoftBank Group Corp. Chairman and CEO Masayoshi Son speaks during a press conference on May 9, 2018 in Tokyo, Japan.
About 10 years ago, SoftBank released a slideshow presentation on the company's 300-year plan. "Unknown virus" got one reference, on slide 69… [+7054 chars]
